message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product for $850000. I understand it's a significant investment, but I believe it's a value you'll appreciate. This product is worth $800000 to you, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who's ready to pay the full value, so this is a limited-time offer. Let me know your thoughts.
